text:
depends if they have webhooks in their workflow though right?

If not, workflow extensions is an alternative, and would be more marketer friendly as it's just an action you can add into the workflow.

So in workflow:

user has submitted form
-> wait 30s (just in case)
-> trigger *new trial action* (created by workflow extension api)
-> send user email with login link and any login instructions

Hello everyone. There is no webhook available to notify that the contact's owner ID has changed. Is there another way to find out when the owner_id was changed on a contact without having to make an request the HubSpot API ?

Hi Everyone! Has anyone played around with hooking up Qlik Sense to HubSpot data? One other similar related question is can you create a custom report in HubSpot and basically pull the data that you put in that single report out through the API?

Hi, I’ve got a webhook which goes to an API to copy the form data to a deal (can’t do it in the workflow because the contact may have different deals with different information) However when ever this webhook is triggered HubSpot is giving me an error:

Event
Webhook wasn’t able to execute, but will retry soon
Server response
The response body for this request was empty

But a minute later I get
Event
Webhook executed using method POST
Server responce
_The expected responce from my api file_

Does any one have any thoughts on what could be going on
When it does work the deal is updated as I expect

It’s also not a timing issue, as I can submit the data to <https://webhook.site/> without a delay, and recieve all the information, when I paste it into postman, it posts absoultely fine through my api
Is there an API Endpoint to create a navigation?
I'm pretty new to HubSpot and want to ask question about integration. I want to do callout from HubSpot and capture the response in Contact. From where should I start?
